text:
@realDonaldTrump YOU TWAT!  Why didn’t you endorce the DPA three weeks ago instead of putting your idiot son in law brother on a Federal Contract, and then have @jaredkushner  sit on a panel with Coronavirus experts? This is all on you. 
#TrumpMustGo 
#25thAmendmentNow 
#TrumpOwnsEveryDeath
